name: qrcodegenerator
description: ``` This Application will generate a QRCode for the Given String/JSON payload ```

scripts.testUrl: OUTPUT_FORMAT=url INPUT='this is a test' node index.js
scripts.testString: OUTPUT_FORMAT=string INPUT='this is a test' node index.js
scripts.testFile: FILE_WITH_PATH=/tmp/qrTest.png OUTPUT_FORMAT=file INPUT='this is a test' node index.js

author: Arshad Khan
